options.name: 1) Now please shrug to the left, then shrug to the right, repeat this three times in total, and finally say "You Can Really Dance".
2) Remember, this set of action is called "You Can Really Dance".
4) Perform "You Can Really Dance" twice in a row.
5) Save this series of actions as "You Can Really Dance twice".
6) Now performing: "You Can Really Dance twice".
7) Now please shrug to the left, then shrug to the right, repeat this two times in total, then wave your body 2 times, and finally say, "What a coincidence!".
8) Save this set of actions and overwrite the original as "You Can Really Dance".
9) Now performing: "You Can Really Dance twice".
